name: Ardent Censer
tooltip:
Ardent Censer

Cost: 2300
+60 Ability Power
+10% Bonus Healing or Shielding
+100% Mana per 5

UNIQUE Passive - Sanctify: Healing or shielding an allied champion enhances you and the affected ally with 10% - 30% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 5 - 20 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on-hit on basic attacks for 6 seconds.
